div.h2: Kindergarten Registration will be online this year!
div.p: If you know someone who has a child who will be five-years-old on or before Sept. 1, 2020, share this information with them and encourage them to register. In order to make sure we have the correct number of teachers assigned at the right schools, we need to know where kindergarten students will be attending school in the fall.
div.a: Click here to register for kindergarten

div.h2: Supporting our students and families when campuses are closed
See the latest news from the Twin Falls School District.
div.p: These posts are often the same information that is emailed to district contacts through PowerSchool. They can be translated by utilizing the google translate button in the top right-hand corner of the page.
div.a: Click here to see the latest new posts.

div.p:
Are you a current volunteer or would you like to be a volunteer in the Twin Falls School District?
There are many things a volunteer can choose to do from being a room parent, helping teachers in the classroom, attending field trips, and helping with coaching.
We have a brand new process for all of our volunteers, please visit this link and complete a quick online application:

div.h2: High school registration is right around the corner!
div.p: Check out the course offerings and plan to make the best of your high school education!

div.h2: The Mission of the Twin Falls School District Education Foundation is to function as an independent entity and work in partnership with the TFSD to support and promote excellence in education in the areas of academics, technology, and student activities.
div.a: Visit the Twin Falls Education Foundation Website

img.h5: Attend the School Board Meeting Digitally
Twin Falls Education Association Announces Scholarship for Future Educators
